DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , randomize , single blind study . Patients enrol study randomly assign ketorolac gabapentin group . The gabapentin ( Neurontin , Pfizer , Mexico ) group instruct take one 300-mg capsule night surgery 1 capsule every 8 hour day surgery first 3 postoperative day . The ketorolac group ( Dolac , Siegfried Rhein , Mexico ) instruct take 10-mg tablet every 8 hour day surgery first 3 postoperative day . Different pain score variable evaluate , along others side effect variable .
